a:t.name: update
a:t.value: 2022-08-24: based on AU 2022 content and updated to QI-Core rename this file to v'0.0.14', as v'0.0.13' is FHIR version in 2022 R4 folder added include QICoreCommon version '1.1.000' called QICoreCommon removed valueset "Device Application": 'http://cts.nlm.nih.gov/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1110.48 removed valueset "Hemorrhagic Stroke": 'http://cts.nlm.nih.gov/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.1.7.1.212' removed valueset "Ischemic Stroke": 'http://cts.nlm.nih.gov/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.1.7.1.247' added value set Application of Graduated Compression Stockings (GCS) added value set Application of Intermittent Pneumatic Compression Devices added value set Application of Venous Foot Pumps (VFP) added value set Comfort Measures Updated Low risk Indicate for VTE and 2 assocatie definitions by using Earliest() Updated requestStatusReason by using qicore-doNOTperformReason for ServiceRequest and removed Function "GetStatusReason" Updated all extensions by using sliceName in QI-Core profile Updated all profile nagation profile wtih new QICore not done name - like MedicationAdministration, ServiceNotRequested, ProcedureNotDone included category evaludation to Observation to prepare for QICORE v5.
